name: First-Run Assistant
description: Interactive guide that helps new users enable key features like morning brief, labor templates, and triggers.

prd.problemStatement: New users may not know which features to enable first. An interactive assistant guides them through enabling core capabilities for immediate value.
userStories: As a new user, I want guided setup so that I enable the most valuable features
As a new user, I want to understand feature benefits so that I make informed choices
